name: Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2和Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4存在未明漏洞（CNVD-2025-29154）
product: ["Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2 <=1.19.5", "Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4 <=1.19.5"]
description: Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2和Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4都是美国Azure Access Technology公司的一种网络门禁控制器。Azure Access Technology BLU-IC2和Azure Access Technology BLU-IC4存在安全漏洞，该漏洞源于缺少Secure和HTTPOnly属性，攻击者可利用该漏洞导致从javascript环境中读取敏感cookie。
solution:
厂商尚未提供漏洞修复方案，请关注厂商主页更新：
https://azure-access.com/security-advisories
